org.lasarobotics.vision.util.color

Class ColorHSV

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lasarobotics.vision.util.color.Color
      • org.lasarobotics.vision.util.color.ColorHSV

  • public class ColorHSV
extends Color
    Implements a color in the HSV color space

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ColorHSV(int h, int s, int v)
      An HSV (hue, saturation, value) color This is NOT an HSL color - they live in different spaces.

        An HSV (hue, saturation, value) color This is NOT an HSL color - they live in different spaces.

        s - Saturation, from 0 to 255
        v - Value, from 0 to 255
